articles.title: U.S. responds to Russia security demands as Ukraine tensions mount - Reuters
articles.description: The United States said on Wednesday it had set out a diplomatic path to address sweeping Russian demands in eastern Europe, as Moscow held security talks with Western countries and intensified its military build-up near Ukraine with new drills.

articles.title: Canada expands training mission in Ukraine, promises non-lethal aid - CBC News
articles.description: Canada will expand its military training mission in Ukraine and ship the embattled eastern European country non-lethal equipment to help it face down the threat of Russian invasion, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced today.

articles.title: US and allies discussing deploying more troops to Eastern Europe prior to any Russian invasion of Ukraine - CNN
